NinjaCat.png.description: A screenshot of the NinjaCat video game. The bottom left corner is labeled (0,0). The bottom right corner is labeled (640,0). The top left corner is labeled (0, 480). Visible on the screen are ninja cat in the lower left, clouds in the upper left, a dog on the lower right, and a ruby in the upper right.
NinjaCat.png.source: Game characters created for Bootstrap by Colleen Murphy
